description: Maximally extended polygons of length 2n on cubic lattice.
references: N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: I. G. Enting and A. J. Guttmann, Area-weighted moments of convex polygons on the square lattice, J. Phys. A 22 (1989), 2639-2642.
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
